result.eng: The computer has run out of memory.
result.html: Tá cuimhne an ríomhaire íditheThe computer has run out of memory.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuiṁne an ríoṁaire ídiṫeThe computer has run out of memory.

result.eng: Although we don’t have a chance, we'll run the race.
result.ga: Cé nach bhfuil seans againn rithfidh muid an rása
result.orig: Cé nach bhfuil seans againn rithfidh muid an rása
result.html: Cé nach bhfuil seans againn rithfidh muid an rásaAlthough we don’t have a chance, we'll run the race.
result.ponchtml: Cé naċ ḃfuil seans againn riṫfiḋ muid an rásaAlthough we don’t have a chance, we'll run the race.

result.ga: Cuireann sé uisce le mo shúile
result.orig: Cuireann sé uisce le mo shúile
result.html: Cuireann sé uisce le mo shúileIt makes my eyes run.
result.ponchtml: Cuireann sé uisce le mo ẛúileIt makes my eyes run.
